description: A mass observed in the breast.

attributes.name: Presence of Breast Mass
attributes.description: Presence of breast mass in the breast.

values.name: Present
values.description: A breast mass is present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No breast mass is present.

values.name: New
values.description: A newly identified breast mass.

values.name: Unchanged
values.description: A breast mass that has not changed in size or appearance.

values.name: Enlarging
values.description: A breast mass that is increasing in size or appearance.

values.name: Decreased
values.description: A breast mass that is decreasing in size or appearance.

values.name: Right breast
values.description: The breast mass is located in the right breast.

values.name: Left breast
values.description: The breast mass is located in the left breast.

values.name: Upper outer
values.description: The breast mass is located in the upper outer quadrant.

values.name: Upper inner
values.description: The breast mass is located in the upper inner quadrant.

values.name: Lower outer
values.description: The breast mass is located in the lower outer quadrant.

values.name: Lower inner
values.description: The breast mass is located in the lower inner quadrant.

values.name: Central
values.description: The breast mass is located in the central quadrant.

values.name: Round
values.description: The breast mass has a round shape.

values.name: Oval
values.description: The breast mass has an oval shape.

values.name: Irregular
values.description: The breast mass has an irregular shape.

values.name: Circumscribed
values.description: The margin of the breast mass is circumscribed.

values.name: Indistinct
values.description: The margin of the breast mass is indistinct.

values.name: Spiculated
values.description: The margin of the breast mass is spiculated.

values.name: Microlobulated
values.description: The margin of the breast mass is microlobulated.

values.name: Low
values.description: The density of the breast mass is low.

values.name: Iso
values.description: The density of the breast mass is iso.

values.name: High
values.description: The density of the breast mass is high.

values.name: Fat-containing
values.description: The density of the breast mass is fat-containing.

values.name: Present
values.description: Enhancement is present in the breast mass.

values.name: Absent
values.description: Enhancement is absent in the breast mass.

values.name: Present
values.description: Breast calcifications are present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No breast calcifications are present.

values.name: Present
values.description: Skin thickening is present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No skin thickening is present.

values.name: Present
values.description: Nipple retraction is present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No nipple retraction is present.

values.name: Present
values.description: Axillary lymphadenopathy is present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No axillary lymphadenopathy is present.
